page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: we are going to do in the morning and then it is soon time for assembly.At lunchtime some people have school dinners and some eat a packed lunch in Mr.Jenkins room.I have a packed lunch in the hall and chat with the people on my table.After lunch we are set new work and finish off the rest of our work.At half past three we go home.I go home and watch television until five o'clock.At five we have tea which is usually sausages and mash.At a quarter to six I get changed for Cubs.I am a sixer in the Red six.We play tig until 6 o'clock and then Akela calls"Pack,pack,pack!"We all go into a circle and do the Grand Howl.Then Fred of Baloo does the subs which is 15p.We play games like "Convoy" or "Catch football".At 7.30 we go home and I go to bed at 9.
